name: Crimson Banarasi Silk
description: A masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship, this Banarasi silk saree features intricate gold zari work on a rich crimson canvas. The pallu is heavily decorated with floral motifs, making it perfect for weddings and grand occasions. The silk is soft yet has a magnificent drape.

name: Royal Kanjivaram Weave
description: Woven with pure mulberry silk, this Kanjivaram saree boasts a classic temple border and a contrasting pallu in deep navy blue. The body is adorned with subtle peacock motifs, symbolizing grace and beauty. It's a timeless addition to any heirloom collection.

name: Elegant Georgette Saree
description: Lightweight and flowy, this georgette saree is designed for the modern woman. It features delicate sequin work along the border and a muted gold blouse piece. Its subtle elegance makes it ideal for evening parties and festive gatherings.

name: Pastel Cotton Saree
description: Perfect for daily wear and office settings, this pastel cotton saree offers unparalleled comfort and breathability. It has a simple, elegant design with a striped pallu and a thin zari border, combining traditional aesthetics with contemporary style.
